column14: An Ogre wearing a leather tunic stands tall before you.
A small scraggly Goblin with a wicked knife stares at you.

column12: Hello friend, it is good to see you up and moving around.
column14: The creature towers above you, an unholy combination of bull and man. Its muscles tense and it rakes its cloven hooves across the floor as you approach.
A vile combination of goat, lion, and snake, the chimera's maws drips with salivia in anticipation. It lies in wait as its next meal approaches.

column12: You'll be a fine addition to my collection.
column14: A slender creature that resembles a woman. As it turns towards you it is clear this is no human but rather a gorgon.

column12: I can't wait to give this new fleece jacket to my friend.
column14: A tall humanoid shape stands before you, its one unblinking eye is unsettling. It turns towards you and looks ready to defend itself.
What stands before seems like a but twisted and corrupted by a darkness. It lunges at you as you enter.

column12: I'm gonna rip your eyes out!
column14: A small and frail harpy stands before you. what it lacks in physical size it makes up for in its razor sharp claws.

column12: I just want some cool shoes.
column14: You find an emaciated creature as you enter the room. It resembles a harpy that has been long neglected. It charges you with fury and hunger in its eyes.

column12: You never should have come here!
column14: A large bloated harpy stands before you. It's sheer size and mass show that it is the mother of the previous two. It studies you intently.
